title: City to pay $6.5M settlement to family of man shot by cop
text:
Published By: Las Vegas Sun - Today 
A city in South Carolina has reached a $6.5 million settlement with the family of an unarmed black man shot to death earlier this year by Read Full Story ... Related articles:
